thread.title: Macy’s: MAC Little Lipglass, Mascara or Pigment ONLY $5 Each Shipped (Regularly $10)
thread.title_full: Macy’s: MAC Little Lipglass, Mascara or Pigment ONLY $5 Each Shipped (Regularly $10)

author: Hannah (Sensational Sidekick)
title: Macy’s: MAC Little Lipglass, Mascara or Pigment ONLY $5 Each Shipped (Regularly $10)
text:
MAC Cosmetics Fans! Through February 26th or while supplies last, hop on over to Macy’s.com where they have dropped the price on select MAC Little Cosmetic items to ONLY $5 (regularly $10). Even sweeter, shipping is FREE on beauty items!
Here are the deals I spotted… MAC Little MAC Lipglass 
Only $5 shipped (regularly $10)
MAC Little MAC Pigment 
Only $5 shipped (regularly $10)
MAC Little MAC Zoom Lash Mascara 
Only $5 shipped (regularly $10)
If you are doing additional shopping, keep in mind that shipping is free with a $99+ order OR score free shipping on ANY size order when you add select beauty items to your cart – prices start as low as $4. Or – choose free in-store pickup, if available near you.
Save on Michael Kors Jackets At Macy’s… (Thanks, Marissa!)
